action.name: Multiattack
entries: 癸鱼会进行两次攻击：一次是咬人，一次是用触手。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw}{@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物{@condition grappled}被斩首。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 9d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage or 14 ({@damage 5d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage if the decapus is grappling a creature other than the target or if the decapus is on the ground or floor. The target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}) unless the decapus is already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}.

trait.name: Boulder Guise
entries: 当完全缩进它的壳里时，地鳖虫看不到，与一块小石子没有区别。

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1})重击伤害。

action.name: Stone Tell
entries: geonid触摸石头物体或表面，知道在过去24小时内有哪些类型的生物出现在该石头的10英尺内。Geonid还能确定每种类型的生物的数量，但不能确定它们的身份。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The slug's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The slug has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: 蛞蝓可以爬上困难的表面，包括倒立在天花板上，而不需要进行能力检查。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 蛞蝓有两种攻击方式：一种是用它的触手，一种是用它的嘴。

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达10英尺，一个生物。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})的毒药伤害，并且目标必须在{@dc 13}宪法救赎中成功，否则会被{@condition poisoned}，持续1分钟。直到该毒药结束，目标是{@condition paralyzed}。目标可以在每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对自己的中毒。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})穿刺伤害。

reaction.name: Animate Tentacle
entries: When the slug takes damage in this cave ({@adventure Shrine of Umberlee|ttp|3|24. Shrine of Umberlee}), it can use its reaction to animate one of the tentacles of the kraken statue and cause it to   make a melee weapon attack ({@hit 3} to hit) against one creature within 20 feet of the statue that the slug can see. The tentacle deals 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage on a hit.

monster.name: Topi
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: 托皮在面对任何变成不死之身的效果时都有优势。

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: 如果伤害将topi降低到0命中率，它必须做一个宪法救赎动作，DC为5+所受伤害，除非伤害是辐射或来自关键打击。如果成功，topi将下降到1点生命值。

action.name: Venomous Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})的砍击伤害加上2 ({@damage 1d4})的毒药伤害，并且目标必须在{@dc 11}宪法救赎中成功，否则会被{@condition poisoned}，直到目标的下一回合结束。

items.name: Two Heads
entries: The two-headed plesiosaurus has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

items.name: Multiattack
entries: 双头犁地龙会进行两次咬合攻击。
